segments.text: How was your holiday to Cyprus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was so fantastic I didn ’ t really want to come home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you happen to meet someone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You always act like this when you ’ Ve fallen in love . Who is he ? How did you meet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His name is Tony and we met my first night in Pathos . He works with my sister who lives there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Was it love at first sight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . I wasn ’ t looking for a holiday romance , but my sister told me that she had promised him that she ’ d set him up on blind date with me . I didn ’ t think I ’ d have anything to lose , so I went .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s just say that by the third date , we both realized that we had fallen in love .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That happened quickly ! Are you going to see him again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Luckily , his company has a position available here , so he ’ s going to see if he can get relocated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like he is madly in love with you . Are you ready for such a serious relationship ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ m not really a spring chicken anymore . We don ’ t know what will happen .
segments.speaker: S2
